Controls.label_about_details: Visit the TR2X GitHub page for further information.

enable_3d_pickups.Title: 3D pickups
enable_3d_pickups.Description: Enables 3D models to be rendered in place of the sprites for pickup items.

enable_cheats.Title: Cheats
enable_cheats.Description:
Enables various cheats:
- L: immediately end the level.
- I: give Lara all weapons; a boost of ammo and medipacks; and all plot items for the current level.
- O: enable DOZY cheat (swimming midair).
     - WALK key: exit DOZY.
     - GUN key: open the closest door (doesn't work in certain places).

fix_m16_accuracy.Title: Fix M16 accuracy
fix_m16_accuracy.Description: Fixes the accuracy of the M16 while Lara is running.

fix_item_duplication_glitch.Title: Fix item duplication glitch
fix_item_duplication_glitch.Description: Fixes the ability to duplicate usage of key items in the inventory.

fix_qwop_glitch.Title: Fix QWOP glitch
fix_qwop_glitch.Description: Fixes Lara entering the QWOP animation.

fix_step_glitch.Title: Fix step glitch
fix_step_glitch.Description: Fixes Lara sometimes being pushed into walls adjacent to steps when running up them in a specific way.

fix_free_flare_glitch.Title: Fix free flare glitch
fix_free_flare_glitch.Description: Fixes the ability to spawn a free flare when pressing the flare input while picking up any item.

fix_pickup_drift_glitch.Title: Fix underwater pickup glitch
fix_pickup_drift_glitch.Description: Fixes Lara sometimes drifting when collecting underwater items, which can push her into walls.

fix_flare_throw_priority.Title: Fix flare throwing priority
fix_flare_throw_priority.Description: Fixes Lara prioritising throwing a spent flare while in mid-air, which can lead to being unable to grab ledges.

fix_walk_run_jump.Title: Fix walk-run-jump breaking
fix_walk_run_jump.Description: Fixes Lara at times not being able to jump immediately after going from her walking to running animation.

fix_floor_data_issues.Title: Fix floor data issues
fix_floor_data_issues.Description: Fixes original issues with floor data/triggers.

fix_item_rots.Title: Fix item rotation issues
fix_item_rots.Description: Fixes original issues with some incorrectly rotated pickups when using the 3D pickups option.

enable_auto_item_selection.Title: Key item pre-selection
enable_auto_item_selection.Description: When Lara presses action against a keyhole or puzzle slot, and she has the corresponding item in the inventory, that item will be pre-selected.

aspect_mode.Title: Aspect mode
aspect_mode.Description: Set the aspect ratio of the game output.

enable_lara_mic.Title: Microphone at Lara
enable_lara_mic.Description: Set the microphone to be at Lara's position. If disabled, the microphone will be at the camera's position.

underwater_music_mode.Title: Underwater music behavior
underwater_music_mode.Description:
Changes how music is played when the camera is underwater.
- Full: music plays normally while underwater.
- Quiet: music plays at half volume while underwater.
- Full but no ambient: music plays normally while underwater, but ambient music is muted.
- Quiet but no ambient: music plays at half volume while underwater, but ambient music is muted.
- None: no music plays while underwater (OG TR2).

enable_fade_effects.Title: Fade effects
enable_fade_effects.Description: Enable fade transitions, for example between credit graphics.
